channel.title: Ready to Go Server
channel.description:
I would really like to download a working client of the 2004-2006 version of RS. What are my best choices?
I've been playing for a long time I gave up a few years ago but I would really like to play some "oldschool" again but I just don't have the time to lvl up my character to what is was back in 04-06' so what I really want to do is have my own server where I can mirror my 04-06' Character to what is was back then and just start playing, doing solo boss fighting, barrows & quests. I have no interest in ever making this a online server.
around 2007-8 I did actually have a server that my friends would sometimes play on but it was relatively useless with very little working, I'm just hoping that maybe today years later we have something from 06 that we could consider fully working? or am I hoping for too much?
Thanks for any help!

item.title: Ready to Go Server
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Oh how we wish Nostalgic, oh how we wish…

Read full topic

item.title: Ready to Go Server
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

Here is a 2006 remake. Bad news is that it looks like it only a free to play attributes. In other words, all of the members ‘perks’ won’t be available to you unless you program them yourself.

Here’s the link anyway: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,654231.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Ready to Go Server
item.dc:creator: @AliAbid AliAbid
item.description:
@AliAbid wrote:

317 is what you are looking for, i wish that there is a ready to go server

Read full topic

item.title: Ready to Go Server
item.dc:creator: @Nostalgic_Soul Nostalgic Soul
item.description:
@Nostalgic_Soul wrote:

Think you could point me in the right direction with a link?

I just want a exact copy of RS from 06, no intention of ever making it online I just want to be able to do quests and barrows and other single player stuff.

Thank you!

Read full topic

item.description:
@holylouis wrote:

ull have to look at some server/clients bc im sure some 317 has it

item.title: Ready to Go Server
item.dc:creator: @Nostalgic_Soul Nostalgic Soul
item.description:
@Nostalgic_Soul wrote:

That’s cool! Hope it all goes well for you.

So should I take that as a sort of answer to my question though, as you’re trying to make one I take it there is no 100% working copy of RS06. That’s a shame I would really like to play barrows again. Oh well thanks!

Read full topic

im working on a 637/639 but itll be a good yr before i finish (currently reading java programming books).
